actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Resolution relating to nuclear first-strike declaration.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the President (1) initiate active negotiations with the Soviet Union on a ban on all nuclear test explosions, (2) encourage other nations to refrain from nuclear testing, and (3) declare a moratorium on nuclear test explosions.

titles.title: Resolution relating to nuclear first-strike declaration.
